scripts.validate_hpp: diff fixture/asc1.ts.fixture.h build/asc1.hpp && clang++ -c -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Wformat=2 -Wformat-security -Werror=format-security -Wcast-align -Wcast-qual -Wconversion -Wdouble-promotion -Wfloat-equal -Wmissing-include-dirs -Wold-style-cast -Wredundant-decls -Wshadow -Wsign-conversion -Wswitch -Wuninitialized -Wunused-parameter -Walloca -Wunused-result -Wunused-local-typedefs -Wwrite-strings -Wpointer-arith -Wfloat-conversion -Wnull-dereference -Wdiv-by-zero -Wswitch-default -Wno-switch-bool -Wunknown-pragmas --target=wasm32 build/asc1.hpp && clang-tidy build/asc1.hpp
scripts.test: npm run coverage && npm run validate_hpp
scripts.coverage: npm run build && npx c8 -- npm run unittest
